first_para: Alun John Pugh (born 9 June 1955) is a Welsh Labour politician and former Welsh Assembly Government Minister for Culture, Welsh Language and Sport. Pugh currently lives in Brynrefail but resided in Deganwy Gwynedd for much of his time in North Wales. He has learnt Welsh as an adult.

full.extract: Alun John Pugh (born 9 June 1955) is a Welsh Labour politician and former Welsh Assembly Government Minister for Culture, Welsh Language and Sport. Pugh currently lives in Brynrefail but resided in Deganwy Gwynedd for much of his time in North Wales. He has learnt Welsh as an adult.
full.title: Alun Pugh
